channel.title: CVE Feed for EFS Software -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for EFS Software -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4495|2023-10-04T12:29:42.620Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /registresult.htm (POST method), in the Resume parameter. The XSS is loaded from /register.ghp.

item.title: CVE-2023-4494|2023-10-04T12:27:04.981Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Easy Chat Server 3.1 version. An attacker could send an excessively long username string to the register.ghp file asking for the name via a GET request resulting in arbitrary code execution on the remote machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-4493|2023-10-04T12:24:02.393Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20address%20book%20web%20server
item.description: Stored Cross-Site Scripting in Easy Address Book Web Server 1.6 version, through the users_admin.ghp file that affects multiple parameters such as (firstname, homephone, lastname, lastname, middlename, workaddress, workcity, workcountry, workphone, workstate, workzip). This vulnerability allows a remote attacker to store a malicious JavaScript payload in the application to be executed when the page is loaded, resulting in an integrity impact.

item.title: CVE-2023-4492|2023-10-04T12:19:44.181Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20address%20book%20web%20server
item.description: Vulnerability in Easy Address Book Web Server 1.6 version, affecting the parameters (firstname, homephone, lastname, middlename, workaddress, workcity, workcountry, workphone, workstate and workzip) of the /addrbook.ghp file, allowing an attacker to inject a JavaScript payload specially designed to run when the application is loaded

item.title: CVE-2023-4491|2023-10-04T12:17:20.208Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20address%20book%20web%20server
item.description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in Easy Address Book Web Server 1.6 version. The exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a very long username string to /searchbook.ghp, asking for the name via a POST request, resulting in arbitrary code execution on the remote machine.

item.title: CVE-2023-4497|2023-10-04T12:32:29.597Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /registresult.htm (POST method), in the Icon parameter. The XSS is loaded from /users.ghp.

item.title: CVE-2023-4496|2023-10-04T12:32:02.370Z -- efs%20software -- easy%20chat%20server
item.description: Easy Chat Server, in its 3.1 version and before, does not sufficiently encrypt user-controlled inputs, resulting in a Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability stored via /body2.ghp (POST method), in the mtowho parameter.
